sub_fields.label: Summit Theme Text
sub_fields.name: summit_theme_text
sub_fields.instructions: 350 characters (~60 word) max description of the Summit

sub_fields.label: Promotional Video Url
sub_fields.name: promotional_video_url
sub_fields.instructions:
Expecting a vimeo link like:
https://vimeo.com/968031596

sub_fields.label: Counters
sub_fields.name: counters
sub_fields.instructions: The Counters group generally shows up in the Landing Section

sub_fields.label: Ratings
sub_fields.name: ratings
sub_fields.instructions:
Use this section for ratings like 4.7 of 5 Stars.
In this example -  "4.7" would be the Measured Value and  "5" would be the Max Value

sub_fields.label: Hide Key Speakers
sub_fields.name: hide_key_speakers
sub_fields.instructions: Hide the Key Speakers until you're ready to show them.

fields.label: Participating Companies Group
fields.name: attending_companies_group
fields.instructions: This group of logos also populates the full page of logos originally found at "/participating-companies"

sub_fields.label: Limit
sub_fields.name: limit
sub_fields.instructions: Number of logos that will show on the summit page.  Since all Participating Logos go here - only the first "X" in this gallery will show up on the summit page.

sub_fields.label: Brochure Thumbnail
sub_fields.message: Update the Brochure thumbnail in the Global Summit Group within MAPconnected Settings.
